{
  "summary": "The module implements a simple sentiment‑analysis service using a chat‑based language model. It builds a structured prompt, invokes the OpenAI chat model, parses the model's response into a predefined schema, and provides a helper to run the analysis on a given text.",
  "business_intent": "Showcase how to create an LLM‑driven sentiment analysis endpoint that can be integrated into applications for automatically classifying user feedback, reviews, or social media posts.",

    "large language model",

    "prompt engineering",
    "structured output parsing",

    "response schema",
    "AI-powered text classification"
  ]
}
